awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 15 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: Beautiful violin virtuoso Camille has two obsessions: the music of Ravel, and a friend of her husband's who crafts violins. But his heart seems to be as cold as her playing is passionate.
plot: Beautiful violin virtuoso Camille has two obsessions: the music of Ravel, and a friend of her husband's who crafts violins. But his heart seems to be as cold as her playing is passionate.
title: Un Coeur en Hiver
